snippet: Rafael Nadal was assured of taking the No. 1 ranking from Novak Djokovic after advancing to the final of the China Open when Tomas Berdych retired in the opening set with a back injury.
abstract: Rafael Nadal is assured of taking the No. 1 ranking from Novak Djokovic after advancing to men's final of the China Open tennis tournament; Serena Williams and Jelena Jankovic advance to the women's final.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal was assured of taking the No. 1 ranking from Novak Djokovic after advancing to the final of the China Open when Tomas Berdych retired in the opening set with a back injury.

headline.main: Nadal to Be No. 1, Win or Lose
headline.print_headline: Nadal to Be No. 1, Win or Lose
